summary: A woman discovers her new husband wants to keep her all to himself.
cast: Tracy Nelson|Michael Riley|Andrea Roth|Thomas Calabro|Sophie Gendron|Steve Adams|Vlasta Vrana|Michelle Chin|Tom Rack|Laura Mitchell|Marjorie Silcoff|Douglas Kidd|Moira Wylie|Helen Batabyal|Karl Claude|Sally Clelford|Jason Daley|Jocelyn Forgues|Brett Kelly|Krista Morin|Jon Welch
title: El marido perfecto
